section.class: s_title parallax s_parallax_is_fixed bg-black-50 pt24 pb24 o_colored_level
s_text_image o_cc o_cc5 pt48 pb48 o_colored_level

div.p: We are a team of professional photographers who love to capture the beauty and emotions of life. We have been in the photography business for over 10 years, and we have worked with clients from various industries and backgrounds. We specialize in wedding, corporate, and studio photography, and we offer a range of packages and services to suit your needs and preferences.

Our passion for photography stems from our curiosity and creativity. We are always looking for new ways to express ourselves and our clients' stories through our lenses. We believe that photography is not only a skill, but also an art and a craft. We pay attention to every detail, from the lighting and composition, to the editing and delivery. We strive to create photos that are not only beautiful, but also meaningful and memorable.

blockquote.em: We do not capture images - we capture moments.

img.alt: woman in red and white plaid shirt and blue denim jeans holding black and white camera

section.class: s_title pt40 pb40 o_colored_level
s_company_team pt48 pb48 o_colored_level

img.alt: woman in white crew neck shirt smiling
img.class: img-fluid rounded-circle mx-auto o_editable_media img o_we_custom_image o_we_image_cropped

div.p: Alice is our lead wedding photographer. She has a knack for capturing the romance and joy of your special day. She loves to work with couples who are adventurous and spontaneous, and she is always ready to follow them to any location.
Alice has a degree in fine arts and a diploma in photography. She has won several awards for her wedding photography, and her work has been featured in many magazines and blogs.

img.alt: smiling man wearing black turtleneck shirt holding camrea
img.class: img-fluid rounded-circle mx-auto o_editable_media img o_we_custom_image o_we_image_cropped

div.p: Bob is our lead corporate photographer. He has a wealth of experience in working with businesses of all sizes and sectors. He knows how to create photos that showcase your brand identity, values, and personality. He is proficient in using various equipment and software to produce high-quality photos that meet your standards and expectations. Bob has a degree in business and a certificate in photography. He has worked with many renowned companies and organizations, and his work has been published in many newspapers and websites.

section.class: s_references pt48 pb32 o_cc o_cc5 o_colored_level

div.p: You are in good company.

section.class: s_cover o_cc o_cc5 pt200 pb200 o_colored_level s_parallax_no_overflow_hidden oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center

div.p: Boost Your Brand Image with Professional Photos.

section.class: s_text_image o_cc o_cc5 pt48 pb48 o_colored_level

div.p: Corporate photography is more than just taking pictures of your employees, products, or events. It is a powerful way to communicate your brand identity, values, and personality to your potential customers, partners, and investors. Corporate photography can help you:

ul.li: Attract and retain talent by showcasing your company culture and work environment;
Increase your sales and conversions by highlighting your products’ features and benefits;
Enhance your reputation and credibility by documenting your achievements and social responsibility;
Strengthen your relationships and loyalty by sharing your stories and emotions.

div.p: As a professional corporate photographer, I can help you create stunning and impactful photos that will reflect your brand essence and vision. I will work with you to understand your goals, needs, and preferences, and tailor my service to suit your specific requirements. I will use my skills, experience, and creativity to capture the best moments and angles of your business, and deliver high-quality photos that will impress your audience and make you stand out from the competition.

section.class: s_cover o_cc o_cc5 pt200 pb200 o_colored_level o_full_screen_height oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center

div.p: The most beautiful day of your life.

section.class: s_masonry_block o_colored_level

div.class: o_grid_item col-lg-6 g-col-lg-6 g-height-10 o_grid_item_image text-center o_colored_level

img.alt: groom beside bride holding bouquet flowers

div.class: o_grid_item text-center o_cc o_cc2 o_colored_level g-col-lg-6 g-height-10 col-lg-6
div.p: Because your wedding will be one of the most beautiful days of your life. Because you are unique. I want to customize your report as much as possible and give you photos and an album that will make you relive your day full of emotions.

During our meetings, you tell me about yourself, your wedding day, what you like and especially what you expect from the photographer who will make your photo report. Then, on my side, I put all my experience as a professional photographer at your service to advise you and make all your wishes come true.
Our commitment:

ul.li: A discreet presence but constantly on the lookout;
A personalized report that we prepare together;
The less formal moments and the decoration are not forgotten;
My advice, my experience and my good mood.

section.class: s_image_gallery o_masonry pb24 o_cc o_cc5 o_spc-medium pt96 o_colored_level

img.alt: clear wine glass lot on table
bride holding bouquet of assorted-color flowers standing on grass field
man in white dress shirt holding woman in white dress
man in white dress shirt holding woman in white dress
two man's hands wearing gold-colored wedding rings
two man's hands wearing gold-colored wedding rings

section.class: s_color_blocks_2 o_colored_level

div.p: The Classic package is designed for couples who want to capture every moment of their special day. From the preparations to the party, I will be with you from 9am to 9pm, documenting your love story with my camera. You will receive at least 250 high-quality photos that will reflect your personality and emotions. The Classic package is the perfect choice for those who want a comprehensive and memorable photo report of their wedding day.

p.font: The Deluxe package is the ultimate option for couples who want to immortalize their wedding day with the best quality and service. From the early morning to the late night, I will be by your side from 7am to 10pm, capturing every detail and emotion of your big day. You will receive at least 450 stunning photos that will showcase your beauty and happiness. The Deluxe package also includes a physical album with at least 50 pages of your favorite photos, and a gorgeous oiled frame of 60 x 80cm that will make a great decoration for your home.
The Deluxe package is the ideal choice for those who want to treat themselves with a luxurious and unforgettable photo experience.

section.class: s_cover o_cc o_cc5 pt200 pb200 o_colored_level parallax s_parallax_is_fixed s_parallax_no_overflow_hidden o_full_screen_height

div.p: Let us capture your truth.

section.class: s_text_block pt96 pb96 o_colored_level bg-900

div.p: Studio sessions are a great way to create beautiful and timeless photos of yourself, your family, or your loved ones. Whether you want to celebrate a milestone, update your portfolio, or simply have fun, studio sessions are the perfect opportunity to express your personality and style. Studio sessions can include:

ul.li: Family portraits: Preserve your precious memories and show your family bond with stunning photos that you can cherish for years to come;
Professional portraits: Impress your clients and employers with polished and confident photos that reflect your personal brand and expertise;
Baby portraits: Capture the cuteness and innocence of your baby with adorable photos that will make you smile every time you look at them;
And more: Whatever your occasion or preference, I can help you create photos that suit your needs and expectations.

div.p: As a professional studio photographer, I can provide you with a comfortable and enjoyable experience in my fully equipped and modern studio. I will guide you through the whole process, from choosing the best outfits and backgrounds, to posing and smiling. I will use my skills, experience, and creativity to capture your best moments and angles, and deliver high-quality photos that will make you proud and happy.
